title: Sample API tests project in Katalon Studio
description: This sample demonstrates fundamental API testing with RESTful   requests. The sample uses the following base URL//sample-web-service-aut.herokuapp.com. To learn   more about API testing, you can refer to this document: Introduction     to API testing.
